column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque is outstanding.  Just go now.  Our favorites are the chopped brisket sandwich
column3: best we've ever had fries  AND mac and cheese
column4: and my partner loves the ribs.  I even had a salad there a couple of times
column5: and it was surprisingly fresh and fantastic (kind of unexpected for a "meat" place).  Nice outside seating now too
column6: and BYOB.  Seriously great BBQ place.  Best in the city. Go.
